original_title: Three including teenager injured in shooting at Ragama
original_body_lines: Three persons including a 17-year-old have been injured and hospitalised following a shooting incident in the Walpola area in Ragama, a short while ago.
Accordingly, the injured persons were admitted to the Ragama Hospital, Police Spokesman SSP Nihal Thalduwa confirmed.
The shooting is reported to have taken place at a residence in the Walpola area.
